page.title: 19A SCHOOL DAY (1)
page.content: I get my football kit as it is Thursday and I walk along to school, it takes about 5 minutes. When I get to school I see my best friend and team mate at football, Mark. I go and put my bag away and run out so I can play Tig. What you have to do for that is someone is " It" and when they catch someone they are it as well and so on. Then the bell rings and we go into school, the first thing we do is reading. I am reading a book called "Kick Off", it is about a 16 year old boy who is mad about football. After reading we have Assembly. Mr Chivers our Headmaster reads us a story then we sing. My favourite hymn is called "When the knight won his spurs in the stories of old". After that we have a prayer. After assembly we do maths, I am doing percentages. Then it is playtime which lasts about 15 minutes.
